item.title: Developing a performance monitoring component in my fully automated algorithmic trading system
item.description: Developing a performance monitoring system for my algorithmic trading system It’s one thing to backtest your signals and forecasts on historical data but it’s a completely different animal in terms of execution. I have written about this here. Another important component of setting up an algorithmic trading system is performance monitoring. Some important questions I had in mind while developing this component, How do I measure my slippage? Commissions paid?

item.title: Designing, Building and Deploying a Fully Automated Algorithmic Trading System
